all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
If they live here let them live unto me; and if they die let them die unto me; for they shall rest from all their labors here, and shall continue their works.
Doctrine and Covenants 124:86
Quote of the Day
"God expects us to magnify the abilities we have been given, but He does not want us to compare our abilities to those of others."
Elder Dale G. Renlund | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
